tool_description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
title: Coinranking

api_list.name: Get global stats
api_list.description: These global statistics tell about the data available on coinranking.

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.name: Get exchanges index
api_list.description:
List of all exchanges currently available on Coinranking, for indexing purposes.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinranking1.p.rapidapi.com/indexes/exchanges"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinranking1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get coins index
api_list.description:
List of all coins currently available on coinranking, for indexing purposes.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinranking1.p.rapidapi.com/indexes/coins"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinranking1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get market
api_list.description:
Find information on a specific market listed on Coinranking.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: Uuid of the market you want to request

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
Uuid of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.name: Get exchange coins
api_list.description:
Find coins listed on a specific exchange.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the exchange you want to request

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Filter the results by searching for coin names or symbols.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Index to sort on. Default is 24h volume

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price numberOfMarkets

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Order in ascending or descending order

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
asc desc

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

api_list.name: Get exchange
api_list.description:
Find information on a specific exchange listed on coinranking. An exchange is a place where cryptocurrencies are traded.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the exchange you want to request

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.name: Get exchanges
api_list.description:
Get a list of exchanges. Exchanges are ranked based on their trading volume in the last 24 hours.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination. Only usable when no filters are applied

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: uuids
optional_parameters.description:
Exchange UUIDs to filter the exchanges on.

Array parameters should be suffixed with brackets.
Example: ?uuids[]=-zdvbieRdZ&uuids[]=8FXHCkosV.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Value to search for within results, e.g. exchange names.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Order by either 24h volume, number of markets or latest ticker. Ordering can only be done when no filters are applied

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume numberOfMarkets lastTickerCreatedAt

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination. Only usable when no filters are applied

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Applies direction to the orderBy query, which can be in ascending or descending order. Only usable when no filters are applied

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc

api_list.name: Get coin modifiers
api_list.description:
Get the modifiers of a coin's supply and their balance.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request the modifiers for

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

api_list.name: Get coin exchanges
api_list.description:
Find exchanges where a specific coin can be traded.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request exchanges for

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Value to search for within results, i.e. exchange names

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Index to order by. Default is 24h volume.

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Order in ascending or descending order

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.name: Get coin OHLC data
api_list.description:
Get OHLC (Open High Low Close) data for the coin throughout time.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

**Beta**
The OHLC endpoint is currently in beta. This means we might make some changes that could be considered breaking for your application, and we expect to have downtime every now and then while we are still in beta.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request. UUIDs of coins can be found using the Get coins endpoint or by checking the URL on coinranking.com, e.g. https://coinranking.com/coin/Qwsogvtv82FCd+bitcoin-btc is the URL for Bitcoin, and the part before the + (Qwsogvtv82FCd) is the UUID.

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar.

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the amount of time periods for which the OHLC data is retrieved. For example, when interval=hour and limit is 10, data will be returned for the last 10 hours.

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description:
The interval determines the time period over which each OHLC item is determined.

Default value: day
Allowed values:
minute 5minutes hour 8hours day week month

api_list.name: Get coin
api_list.description: Find information about a specific coin.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request. UUIDs of coins can be found using the Get coins endpoint or by checking the URL on coinranking.com, e.g. https://coinranking.com/coin/Qwsogvtv82FCd+bitcoin-btc is the URL for Bitcoin, and the part before the + (Qwsogvtv82FCd) is the UUID.

optional_parameters.name: timePeriod
optional_parameters.description:
Time period where the change and sparkline are based on

Default value: 24h
Allowed values:
24h 7d 30d

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.name: Get coin price
api_list.description: With the price endpoint the price can be requested for a specific coin on a specific time. The response is just a single price nearest to the requested time, including its timestamp.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you need the price

optional_parameters.name: timestamp
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp. Epoch timestamp in seconds. If it is not provided this endpoint will get the latest price

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency. This is the currency the price is shown in, which defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.name: Get coin price history
api_list.description: Coinranking keeps track of prices on all listed assets. The history endpoint lists prices and their timestamp for the requested time period, useful for making a chart.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: timePeriod
optional_parameters.description:
Timeperiod where the change and history are based on

Default value: 24h
Allowed values:
3h 24h 7d 30d 3m 1y 3y 5y

api_list.name: Get coins
api_list.description: Get a list of coins. Coins are by default ordered by their rank, which - somewhat simplified - means that they are ordered on marketcap. The response not only returns a list of coins, but also statistics regarding the requested list, such as the volume in the last 24 hours.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description:
Tags to filter the list on.

Allowed values:
defi, stablecoin, nft, dex, exchange, staking, dao, meme, privacy

Array parameters should be suffixed with brackets.
Example: ?tags[]=defi&tags[]=nft.

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Applies direction to the orderBy query, which can be in ascending or descending order.

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination.

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Filter the results by searching for coin names or symbols.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination.

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: symbols
optional_parameters.description:
Symbols to filter the list on.

Array parameters should be suffixed with brackets.
Example: ?symbols[]=BTC&symbols[]=ETH.

optional_parameters.name: tiers
optional_parameters.description:
We seperate coins into three tiers. With this parameter you can filter coins on the tiers you need. Read more about out our tiers in our [methodology](https://support.coinranking.com/article/56-what-is-our-ranking-methodology)

Array parameters should be suffixed with brackets.
Example: ?tiers[]=1&tiers[]=2.

optional_parameters.name: uuids
optional_parameters.description:
UUIDs to filter the list on. If you know the UUIDs of the coins you want to fetch, you can use this filter to get the specific coins.

Array parameters should be suffixed with brackets.
Example: ?uuids[]=razxDUgYGNAdQ&uuids[]=Qwsogvtv82FCd.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Index to order by. All sortings excluding listedAt still take our different tiers of coins into account, read more about it in our methodology.

Default value: marketCap
Allowed values:
price marketCap 24hVolume change listedAt

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. This includes the price, the change and the sparkline. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: timePeriod
optional_parameters.description:
By setting the timeperiod the change percentage and sparkline in the response will be calculated accordingly

Default value: 24h
Allowed values:
3h 24h 7d 30d 3m 1y 3y 5y

api_list.name: Get reference currencies
api_list.description: Get a list of reference currencies, which can be used as reference for coins. The response includes all the essentials for this use-case, such as the symbol (e.g. USD) and - if available - the sign (e.g. $).

optional_parameters.name: types
optional_parameters.description:
A currency is one of three types: coin (e.g. Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.), fiat (US Dollar, Euro, Yen, etc.) or a denominator (e.g. Satoshi). Filter the response by providing one or more types

Allowed values:
coin, fiat, denominator

Array parameters should be suffixed with brackets.
Example: ?types[]=coin&types[]=fiat.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Filter the results by searching for currency names or symbols.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 20
Size range: 0-100

api_list.name: Get search suggestions
api_list.description: Search suggestions are a quick and easy way to find data on coinranking. The endpoint only accepts one parameter; a query. With this query you can find currencies (including fiat), exchanges and markets, by their symbol or name. The response always returns a set of the most prominent coins, exchanges and markets matching your query.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Value to search on

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which the coin prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.name: Get markets
api_list.description:
Get a list of markets. Markets are ranked by their volume over the last 24 hours. Use our filters to get a subset of the markets.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

optional_parameters.name: toCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description: Filter markets with specific currency as either base or quote. The toCurrencyUuid will not alter how the prices will be shown, but will keep the base price. This can be combined with the currencyUuid variable to get specific markets.

optional_parameters.name: quoteCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description: Filter markets with specific currency as quote

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination. Only usable when no filters are applied

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination only usable when no filters are applied

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: baseCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description: Filter markets with specific currency as base

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Sort in ascending or descending order. Only usable when no filters are applied.

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Sort by either 24h volume or price. Only usable when no filters are applied

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Filter the results by searching for coin names, symbols or exchange names.

optional_parameters.name: currencyUuid
optional_parameters.description: Filter markets with specific currency as either base or quote. Specifying a currencyUuid will also alter how prices are shown: By default all the markets will show the price of the base in the reference currency (e.g. an ETH/BTC market will show the price of ETH). By specifying a currencyUuid the prices of this currency will always be shown, disregarding whether or not this currency represents the base or the quote in the market (e.g. by specifying BTC as currency, both ETH/BTC as BTC/USD markets will show prices of BTC)

api_list.name: Get exchange markets
api_list.description:
Find markets on a specific exchange.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the exchange you want to request markets for

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Index to sort on. Default is 24h volume.

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Value to search for within results, e.g. exchange names, currency names, or currency symbols

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Order in ascending or descending order

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc

api_list.name: Get coin issuance blockchains
api_list.description:
Get the issuance blockchains on which the coin is issued.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request the blockchains for

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

api_list.name: Get coin supply
api_list.description: Get the maximum, total, and circulating supply of a coin.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request the supply for

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinranking1.p.rapidapi.com/coin/{uuid}/supply"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinranking1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

Offset. Used for pagination

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Index to sort on. Default is 24h volume.

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Value to search for within results, e.g. exchange names, currency names, or currency symbols

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Order in ascending or descending order

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc
